question_text: While waiting for their friends to finish shopping, Luffy wandered around the Going Merry. They spent 4/7 of an hour in the kitchen, 1/7 of an hour in the deck, and 1/7 of an hour in the crow's nest. In all, how many hours did Luffy spend wandering around the Going Merry?\n_ hours
solution: Total hours Luffy spent wandering the Going Merry = Fraction of hour spent in kitchen + fraction of hour spent in deck + fraction of hour spent in crow's nest.

To add the fractions, add the numerators and keep the denominators the same. Adding shows:$\frac{4}{7}$+$\frac{1}{7}$+$\frac{1}{7}$=$\frac{6}{7}$.\nLuffy spent $\frac{6}{7}$ of an hour wandering around the Going Merry.
